text: 7.22: Zo 8.36; Ga 5.13; Ef 6.6; Fm 1.16; 1 Pi 2.16Guma ana fhura ŋaara khɨnan muuŋv kɨrim, Guma Bakɨme ana kamgirga, ana ntigem Guma Bakɨme guma ma. Ana ntigem, Guma Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman, ana wom ŋaara guma khɨn ki fhuvara. Mba tɨvara, guma ana bɨkbɨɨgip kim, Guma Bakɨme ana kamgi, ana ntigem fhura Kraisan ŋgari ŋaara guma khɨn ki.
